name: Innoppl
overview:
Innoppl - Innovative People in Software & web Development services.

Innoppl is an information technology development and consulting company in San Francisco & Atlanta that provides IT solutions for small and large companies worldwide. Innoppl focuses on Mobile App Development services in San Francisco for iPhone, Android and smart phones

Our business model utilizes local US project managers and highly efficient mobile App developers in San Francisco, Atlanta developers to bring world class services to your firm at extremely competitive prices. Innoppl is headquartered in Atlanta with its primary development center in San Francisco & Chennai, India. In the US our team of project managers supervise local programmers as well as their foreign division Innoppl team members. Because we believe that Happy Employees lead to Happy Clients, we can proudly claim that Innoppl’s employee turnover rate is one of the industry’s lowest.
